title: Kalista picked competitively, instant QQ
body:
Do we want more viable picks or not? 

If competitively viable = "op" then don't be surprised when only a few champs are competitively viable.

If you ever want to have the worst experience in game, have a friend play Kalista while you are Olaf. Have fun.

The ones you listed are assassins with multiple gap-closers (akali, Diana) or the targeted-gapcloser insta-kill assassins (irelia, Yi). Those champions are assassins so of course they wouldn't have trouble reaching her. The only one there that actually has difficulty reaching her is Udyr.
kalista has counters. You probably can't reach her as olaf. Sorry. But any other adc out classes her with ACTUAL STEROIDS and huge escapes that don't require kiting ability.

Damn, all those ADC 1v1s I see all the time in high-level play. Just 2 ADCs in a vacuum.

The fact that 1 ADC dies and 1 doesn't is the entire reason we're having this fucking discussion. Not to compare X to Y in a number crunching contest that a full AP Teemo would win anyway, showing the futility of numbers in a vacuum.

In a teamfight, trist will put out way more dps, even without hurricane, thanks to her steroids and RIDICULOUS peel and safety (not even close to kalista, honestly). In a 1v1, kalista will probably lose. In a teamfight, sure, she'll do fine dodging skillshots, applying rend, but other adcs have the upper hand in ridiculous dps that kalista doesn't have.

Don't complain about "melee" champs then. Many melee champs have some sort of gap closer to give them a chance. Just because she has an easier time to kite bruisers does not mean "If you are melee you have no chance against Kalista"

I remind you, zed is a melee champion.

That too. It's hard to find your personal champions because they WILL get a buff for no reason, or everyone else gets nerfed, or someone picked them in LCS (god forbid there's some pick variety). Immediate QQ follows, your champion gets perma banned, you get accused of picking only ezmode champions, then shortly afterwards an epic nerf follows that leaves the champion in pieces and everyone says "good riddance noob l2p" and moves on to crying about someone else and you're out a champion and €10 for a skin.

There are enough anti melee champions in this game, we didn't need another one.
One that also melts and slows your whole team with a skill that refresh it's cooldown and refunds its mana cost even.
One that assure you can never steal baron or dragon from her team.
One that has free wards.
One that has a 20% max health nuke as a six second passive cooldown,
One that can instantly save her support that's in a bad spot.

This champion is beyond broken. **She's HoN level of garbage balance broken.**

Just my humble opinion, but I'm willing to bet it isn't because they think she's op, its because she just IS NOT FUN TO PLAY AGAINST. When you loose to a Kalista you don't feel outplayed like you would to a good Zed or Yasuo, you feel like you lost because of some cheap gimmick the enemy team is abusing.
That's how I feel when I play against Yasuo.
There was already QQ about Kalista; it just got cranked up to 11 after a 3 match span of Sneaky, Doublelift and Wildturtle completely owning with the champ.

Anyone who even looked at her passive and gave it some thought have been complaining. They've just been proven correct and now are being joined by the people who only voice their opinions on balance when LCS games happen.

Really though, the sheer combination of stupid things in Kalista's kit is almost hilarious.

Outdamaging junglers' smite on Dragon and Baron?
TWENTY % magic damage? Not only that, but MAX health?
Free wards? Ashe and Quinn's respective reveal abilities don't even come close to being as useful.

Her kit doesn't make sense. Ignoring the fact that she's obnoxious to literally everybody but the Kalista player in solo queue, her kit doesn't have any kind of cohesiveness to it. It's almost as random as old Sions, just without the weird AP/AD scalings.

So much this. Everyone has hated her kit since forever, people were just afraid to complain because of the downvote rain by the "lel she isnt in LC$ noob" folks.
Laning with a Kalista is a horrible experience as well, since you cant deny her spear. I love losing control from my character randomly!

It is one thing being good against immobiles. It is another being capable of kiting three immobiles at once with just a Hurricane and actually win by nuking half their health with a single Rend.

The above actually happened to me before btw. Our Shaco's Q was on CD, Janna's Q missed and i was a fed Garen. There was literally nothing we could do to kill this out of position Kalista. This is the first time i am actually crying "Bullshit" in this game.
she sounds like she did a hell of a job tho. couldnt vayne do the same thing? or even jinx?

It isn't so much "Oh she is OP because a pro picked her" it is more she is just anti-fun for the team without a kalista. The frontline basically NEVER touches her if she is even halfway decent at using her passive, she out does junglers who are supposed to have the final say in objective control with smite, and her ult is anti fun for her and her team unless they are a pre made duo/5 man. The issue is that She is so stilted towards 5 man competitive play, while she is really sub par outside of that environment. I agree that people are not thinking straight if they want more viable picks (hey guess what, it is GOOD to not feel like you have enough bans, because that means we have an actual increase in powerful champs to play than usual), but Kalista *is* too strong right now, she is just one of those complicated champs like Orianna who nobody knows how to play but when somebody figures it out it is totally overpowered.

that could be said for many many champs. Kalista isn't op in the slightest. She is just like Katarina imo, in the way that she is a situational pick. If the enemy team lacks hard cc, im picking Kat. If the enemy team is lacking in aoe cc, assassins, or single target cc, im picking Kalista.   i'm tired of everyone ranting about how op she is. I'm sorry that the champ you play, does not work in every match up. Champ diversity folks. Enemy team picks kalista, u pick Darius, Irelia, Jax, Maokai, Malphite, Sejuani, Nasus. All of  this champs would screw her over due to the fact that once she is slowed,  her passive is horrendous. Just like you have to build a team to stop kat, you have to do the same for Kalista. There is a such thing as champion diversity.
